Parties at McSorley's
Versatile Party Spaces by the Beach
Looking for the ultimate venue to host your next corporate gathering, birthday celebration, wedding festivity, or college party? Look no further than McSorley‚Äôs Beach Pub, where the vibrant energy of Fort Lauderdale meets breathtaking ocean views. Whether you‚Äôre planning an intimate get-together or an all-out bash, our lounge and rooftop spaces are the perfect backdrop for unforgettable events
Bars

Why Choose McSorley‚Äôs Beach Pub for Your Event?
Versatile Event Spaces
With multiple levels to choose from, McSorley‚Äôs offers a variety of spaces tailored to your needs:
The Lounge:
A sophisticated yet relaxed setting, perfect for corporate events, cocktail receptions, and private parties.
The Rooftop Deck:
Featuring panoramic views of the Atlantic Ocean, this space is ideal for pre- and post-wedding celebrations, college parties, and birthdays.
Unbeatable Ambiance
The fusion of beachside charm, Irish-American hospitality, and modern amenities creates a warm and welcoming atmosphere for all your guests.
Customizable Experiences
We‚Äôll work with you to craft a personalized event experience, from food and drink packages to entertainment options like live music, karaoke, or a private DJ.
Perfect for Any Occasion
Corporate Events
Impress clients or reward your team with an event that combines business with pleasure in our stylish lounge or rooftop space.
Birthdays
Celebrate another trip around the sun with delicious food, refreshing drinks, and the best view in town.
Pre- & Post-Wedding Parties
From elegant rehearsal dinners to lively after-parties, McSorley‚Äôs sets the stage for cherished memories.
Sporting Events
Catch every moment of the action with over 40 TVs while enjoying a fun and festive environment.
College Parties
Our rooftop deck is the ultimate spot for unforgettable nights with friends.
Amenities That Make a Difference
Stunning Views
The rooftop deck offers unparalleled oceanfront views to elevate your event experience.
Delicious Food & Drinks
Enjoy customizable catering options featuring classic pub fare, specialty cocktails, and more.
Seamless Planning
Our team is here to help you coordinate every detail, ensuring a stress-free experience.
State-of-the-Art Entertainment
Whether you‚Äôre watching a big game, dancing to a live DJ, or enjoying karaoke, our venue has you covered.
Contact us
PARTIES AT MCSORLEY'S
Enquire about a Party or Event
Simply fill out the form below with your event details, and a member of the McSorley's team will be in touch to make sure every detail is just as you envision.

PARTIES AT MCSORLEY'S
Here is some feedback on our parties
Rock on McSorley‚Äôs! Epic evening highlighted with breathtaking views, scrumptious bites, refreshing drinks made exceptional by impeccable service! Best corner views, comfort of home in paradise!
Irish E
Perfectly food at a decent price. Very friendly staff and a good range of beers. I would recommend the karaoke evenings, really good fun
Gary M
The beers, the food the atmosphere are very nice. At McSorley‚Äôs now you can enjoy their remodeled rooftop and listen to live music.
Maria L
We came here this past weekend as a bachelorette group and had an amazing time! Our service was perfect. We were a big group which was handled with ease. The rooftop is beautiful and we loved watching the football game there. We had an absolute blast!
Maggie S
A really great Irish bar! Lovely food, nice staff and loads of TVs to watch the game. Karaoke was a lot of fun too. Looking forward to my next visit.
James B
We loved this place. What a fun and cozy sports bar. Tons of tv‚Äôs. A fun crowd. The bartender even had a strong Irish accent. Cold beers. Monday Night Football here was fun.
Troy R
